mapper.select: SELECT /* ThemeThemeZoneMapper.XML, selectThemeThemeZoneInfo, SAC 전시, 2014-02-21 */ A.BNR_MENU_NM , A.BNR_MENU_ID , A.BNR_NM FROM ( SELECT TDL.LIST_NM AS BNR_MENU_NM ,TDL.LIST_ID AS BNR_MENU_ID , TDL.LIST_NM AS BNR_NM FROM TB_DP_LIST TDL WHERE TDL.LIST_ID = #{themeZoneId} UNION ALL SELECT ( SELECT TCM.CD_NM FROM TB_CM_CD TCM where TCM.CD_ID = TDB.BNR_MENU_ID) AS BNR_MENU_NM , TDB.BNR_MENU_ID , TDBE.BNR_NM FROM TB_DP_BNR TDB , TB_DP_BNR_EXPO TDBE WHERE 1=1 AND TDB.BNR_INFO = #{themeZoneId} AND TDB.BNR_MENU_ID = TDBE.BNR_MENU_ID AND TDB.BNR_SEQ = TDBE.BNR_SEQ ) A

SELECT /* ThemeThemeZoneMapper.XML, selectThemeThemeZoneList, SAC 전시, 2014-02-17 */ Z2.TENANT_ID , Z2.MENU_ID , Z2.PROD_ID , Z2.PART_PROD_ID , Z2.CATALOG_ID , Z2.TOP_MENU_ID , Z2.META_CLSF_CD , Z2.SVC_GRP_CD , Z2.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , Z2.TOTAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT Z1.TENANT_ID , Z1.MENU_ID , Z1.PROD_ID , Z1.PART_PROD_ID , Z1.CATALOG_ID , Z1.TOP_MENU_ID , Z1.META_CLSF_CD , Z1.SVC_GRP_CD , Z1.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , Z1.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , Z1.EXPO_ORD , Z1.EXPO_ORD_SUB , COUNT(Z1.PROD_ID) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Z1.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN DESC, Z1.EXPO_ORD, Z1.EXPO_ORD_SUB) AS RNUM FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID , E.MENU_ID , C.PROD_ID , C.PART_PROD_ID , '' AS CATALOG_ID , E.TOP_MENU_ID , F.META_CLSF_CD , F.SVC_GRP_CD , F.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , B.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , B.EXPO_ORD , B.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY C.PROD_ID ORDER BY F.UPD_DT DESC) AS RN FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP C , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG D , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY E , TB_DP_PROD F , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE H WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIST_ID = #{themeZoneId} AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND G.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT AND B.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND B.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.MENU_ID = E.MENU_ID AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND F.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID
AND F.PROD_CHRG_YN = #{prodCharge} /* 상품유료여부 */
AND F.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND (H.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR H.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND C.PART_PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND (CASE WHEN F.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN F.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN F.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN 0 WHEN F.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN F.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN F.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN NVL(F.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND #{videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN #{sdVideoSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 1 END) = 1 UNION ALL SELECT A.TENANT_ID , ESM.MENU_ID , C.PROD_ID , C.PART_PROD_ID , D.CATALOG_ID , F.TOP_MENU_ID , F.META_CLSF_CD , F.SVC_GRP_CD , F.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , B.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , B.EXPO_ORD , B.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY C.PROD_ID ORDER BY F.UPD_DT DESC) AS RN FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP C , TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG D /* 쇼핑 카탈로그 */ , TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG E /* 카탈로그-상품 매핑 */ , TB_DP_MENU_SHPG_MAPG ESM , TB_DP_PROD F , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIST_ID = #{themeZoneId} AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND G.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT AND C.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND B.PROD_ID = D.CATALOG_ID AND D.CATALOG_ID = E.CATALOG_ID AND C.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND D.CATALOG_ID = ESM.CATALOG_ID AND E.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND F.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID
AND F.PROD_CHRG_YN = #{prodCharge} /* 상품유료여부 */
AND F.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DV ,TB_CM_DEVICE CM WHERE 1=1 AND DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = CM.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND CM.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN = 'Y' /*쇼핑 상품 단말 지원 여부*/ AND DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND DV.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID ) AND ( CASE WHEN F.TOP_MENU_ID IN ( 'DP28' ) THEN ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD SP WHERE SP.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND SP.SALE_YN = 'Y'
AND SP.B2B_PROD_YN = #{b2bProd}
AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ELSE 1 END ) = 1 ) Z1 WHERE RN = 1 ) Z2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT /* ThemeThemeZoneMapper.XML, ThemeThemeZoneDevice, SAC 전시, 2014-04-01 */ F.EBOOK_SPRT_YN, F.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, F.COMIC_SPRT_YN, F.MUSIC_SPRT_YN, F.HDV_SPRT_YN, F.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN FROM TB_CM_DEVICE F WHERE DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND F.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* ThemeThemeZoneMapper.XML, selectThemeThemeZone, SAC 전시, 2014-03-24 */ BB.LIST_ID , BB.LIST_NM , BB.IMG_PATH , BB.TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT AA.LIST_ID , AA.LIST_NM , AA.IMG_PATH , COUNT(AA.LIST_ID) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AA.EXPO_ORD, AA.EXPO_ORD_SUB) AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT TDL.LIST_ID , TDL.LIST_NM , TDL.IMG_PATH , TDL.EXPO_ORD , TDL.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TDL.LIST_ID ORDER BY TDL.LIST_ID ) AS RN FROM TB_DP_LIST TDL WHERE TDL.LIST_ID LIKE 'TAR%' AND TDL.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDL.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD TDLP , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG B , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_PROD D , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD E , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE F , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G WHERE TDL.LIST_ID = TDLP.LIST_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TDLP.EXPO_START_DT AND TDLP.EXPO_END_DT AND TDLP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND G.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDLP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TDLP.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND A.PART_PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND E.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND A.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND (F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND A.PART_PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND (CASE WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN 0 WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN D.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN NVL(D.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND #{videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN #{sdVideoSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 1 END) = 1 ) UNION ALL SELECT TDL.LIST_ID , TDL.LIST_NM , TDL.IMG_PATH , TDL.EXPO_ORD , TDL.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TDL.LIST_ID ORDER BY TDL.LIST_ID DESC) AS RN FROM TB_DP_LIST TDL WHERE TDL.LIST_ID LIKE 'TAR%' AND TDL.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDL.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT /*+ use_nl(G) use_nl(D) */ 1 FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD TDLP , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A , TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG B /* 쇼핑 카탈로그 */ , TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG C /* 카탈로그-상품 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD D , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD E WHERE TDL.LIST_ID = TDLP.LIST_ID AND TDLP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDLP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND TDLP.PROD_ID = B.CATALOG_ID AND B.CATALOG_ID = C.CATALOG_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND D.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND E.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DV , TB_CM_DEVICE CM WHERE 1=1 AND DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = CM.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND CM.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN = 'Y' /*쇼핑 상품 단말 지원 여부*/ AND ( DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd} ) AND DV.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID ) AND ( CASE WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID IN ( 'DP28' ) THEN ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SHPG_PROD SP WHERE SP.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND SP.SALE_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ELSE 1 END ) = 1 ) ) AA WHERE RN = 1 ) BB WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count}
